name: Jessica Kirk's Barbecue Marinade
description: Jessica Kirk, a Kansas state barbecue champion, was forthcoming about her barbecue secrets in a 1989 interview with The Times. To her, who is preparing the sauce and meat is as important as what goes into it. ''There is a lot of ego involved in this thing,'' she said. This barbecue marinade can be used with chicken, beef or pork.
keywords: brown sugar, pineapple juice, soy sauce

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan combine pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic powder and, if desired, liquor. Stir well and bring to boil.
In a bowl, blend cornstarch and cold water. Stir into the boiling sauce and simmer for two minutes. Let cool to room temperature.
